      • tick

        public void tick()
        Description copied from class: Entity

      • collide

        public void collide(Entity other)
        Description copied from class: Entity
        This function is called AFTER the necessary blocking mechanisms have been done by the engine. Every object that occupies our square/was trying to occupy our square/occupies the square we tried to go to/occupies the square we tried to occupy will be on this list, even if we don't share a collision layer. The collision layer is for "blocking" effect only, which is dealt automatically in the engine. Hence, it is possible to have entities on this list who share no layers in common and have the same coordinates as us.
        Overrides:
        collide in class Entity
        Parameters:
        other - the other Entity
